title: Vision Suite using Face Recognition
features: Designed and implemented a real‑time face‑recognition attendance system using OpenCV and dlib, cutting manual check‑in time by 70% while achieving 98% accuracy under varied lighting conditions.
Developed an automated parking‑space detection pipeline with YOLOv5 and video analytics, mapping vehicle positions to boost parking utilization metrics by 30%.
Engineered cross‑platform drag‑and‑drop UI and gesture‑controlled interaction modules with PyQt5 and MediaPipe, accelerating user task completion by 40%.
